pullrequest.title: Add ArrangePlugin to arrange models for tasks

content.raw:
I tested this a bit and produced a new arat.world in 1431ab7. I'll create a pull request for that when this one is merged.

My only complaint is that when I accidentally place an object in the plugin block that hasn't been declared in the world, I get my favorite Boost assertion error:
"gzserver: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::Model; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::Model*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed."

If it's possible to replace this with a more descriptive error message, that would be awesome.
content.html:
I tested this a bit and produced a new arat.world in 1431ab7. I'll create a pull request for that when this one is merged.

My only complaint is that when I accidentally place an object in the plugin block that hasn't been declared in the world, I get my favorite Boost assertion error: "gzserver: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::Model; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::Model*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed."

If it's possible to replace this with a more descriptive error message, that would be awesome.
